member.name: T:Windows.Networking.Connectivity.WwanConnectionProfileDetails
member.summary: Used to access information specific to a WWAN connection.

member.name: P:Windows.Networking.Connectivity.WwanConnectionProfileDetails.AccessPointName
member.summary: Indicates the name of the access point used to establish the WWAN connection.

member.name: P:Windows.Networking.Connectivity.WwanConnectionProfileDetails.HomeProviderId
member.summary: Indicates the Home Network Provider ID.

member.name: P:Windows.Networking.Connectivity.WwanConnectionProfileDetails.IPKind
member.summary: Gets a value that describes a level of supported IP.
member.returns: A value that describes a level of supported IP.

member.name: P:Windows.Networking.Connectivity.WwanConnectionProfileDetails.PurposeGuids
member.summary: Gets a list of purpose group GUIDs.
member.returns: A list of purpose group GUIDs.

member.name: M:Windows.Networking.Connectivity.WwanConnectionProfileDetails.GetCurrentDataClass
member.summary: Indicates the class of data service offered by the network currently in use for the WWAN connection.
member.returns: The class of data service currently provided.

member.name: M:Windows.Networking.Connectivity.WwanConnectionProfileDetails.GetNetworkRegistrationState
member.summary: Retrieves the current network registration state for the WWAN connection.

member.name: T:Windows.Networking.Connectivity.WwanDataClass
member.summary: Defines values used to indicate the class of data service provided by a WWAN network connection.

member.name: F:Windows.Networking.Connectivity.WwanDataClass.Cdma1xEvdo
member.summary: This network provides CDMA Evolution-Data Optimized (originally Data Only, 1xEDVO, also known as CDMA2000 1x EV-DO, or 1x EVDO) data service.

member.name: F:Windows.Networking.Connectivity.WwanDataClass.Cdma1xEvdoRevA
member.summary: The network provides 1xEVDO RevA data service.

member.name: F:Windows.Networking.Connectivity.WwanDataClass.Cdma1xEvdoRevB
member.summary: The network provides 1xEVDO RevB data service.

member.name: F:Windows.Networking.Connectivity.WwanDataClass.Cdma1xEvdv
member.summary: The network provides CDMA Evolution-Data/Voice (also known as CDMA 2000 1x EV-DV, or 1x EVDV) data service is supported.

member.name: F:Windows.Networking.Connectivity.WwanDataClass.Cdma1xRtt
member.summary: The network provides CDMA 1x Radio Transmission Technology (1xRTT) data service.

member.name: F:Windows.Networking.Connectivity.WwanDataClass.Cdma3xRtt
member.summary: The network provides CDMA 3x Radio Transmission Technology (3xRTT) data service.

member.name: F:Windows.Networking.Connectivity.WwanDataClass.CdmaUmb
member.summary: The network provides UMB data service.

member.name: F:Windows.Networking.Connectivity.WwanDataClass.Custom
member.summary: The network provides a data service not listed in this table.

member.name: F:Windows.Networking.Connectivity.WwanDataClass.Edge
member.summary: The network provides Enhanced Data for Global Evolution (EDGE).

member.name: F:Windows.Networking.Connectivity.WwanDataClass.Gprs
member.summary: The network provides General Packet Radio Service (GPRS) data service.

member.name: F:Windows.Networking.Connectivity.WwanDataClass.Hsdpa
member.summary: The network provides High-Speed Downlink Packet Access (HSDPA) data service.

member.name: F:Windows.Networking.Connectivity.WwanDataClass.Hsupa
member.summary: The network provides High-Speed Uplink Packet Access (HSUPA) data service.

member.name: F:Windows.Networking.Connectivity.WwanDataClass.LteAdvanced
member.summary: The network provides LTE Advanced data service.

member.name: F:Windows.Networking.Connectivity.WwanDataClass.None
member.summary: The network does not provide a data service.

member.name: F:Windows.Networking.Connectivity.WwanDataClass.Umts
member.summary: The network provides Universal Mobile Telecommunications System (UMTS) data service.

member.name: T:Windows.Networking.Connectivity.WwanNetworkIPKind
member.summary: Defines constants that describe a level of supported IP. The values reflect the WWAN_IP_TYPE enumeration. You can use these values to determine which cellular profile to use (for example, to choose between IMS and SUPL).

member.name: F:Windows.Networking.Connectivity.WwanNetworkIPKind.Ipv4
member.summary: Indicates support for IPv4.

member.name: F:Windows.Networking.Connectivity.WwanNetworkIPKind.Ipv4v6
member.summary: Indicates support for IPv4 with IPv6.

member.name: F:Windows.Networking.Connectivity.WwanNetworkIPKind.Ipv4v6v4Xlat
member.summary: Indicates support for 464XLAT (which allows clients on IPv6-only networks to access IPv4-only Internet services).

member.name: F:Windows.Networking.Connectivity.WwanNetworkIPKind.Ipv6
member.summary: Indicates support for IPv6.

member.name: F:Windows.Networking.Connectivity.WwanNetworkIPKind.None
member.summary: Default support; indicates no specific level of support.

member.name: T:Windows.Networking.Connectivity.WwanNetworkRegistrationState
member.summary: Defines the network registration states for a WWAN connection.

member.name: F:Windows.Networking.Connectivity.WwanNetworkRegistrationState.Denied
member.summary: Registration of the connection with all available networks is denied. However, emergency voice calls may still be made. This value applies only to voice connections, and not to data connections.

member.name: F:Windows.Networking.Connectivity.WwanNetworkRegistrationState.Deregistered
member.summary: The connection is not registered with a network.

member.name: F:Windows.Networking.Connectivity.WwanNetworkRegistrationState.Home
member.summary: The connection is registered with a home network.

member.name: F:Windows.Networking.Connectivity.WwanNetworkRegistrationState.None
member.summary: No networks found for this connection.

member.name: F:Windows.Networking.Connectivity.WwanNetworkRegistrationState.Partner
member.summary: The connection is registered with a roaming network partner.

member.name: F:Windows.Networking.Connectivity.WwanNetworkRegistrationState.Roaming
member.summary: The connection is registered with a roaming network.

member.name: F:Windows.Networking.Connectivity.WwanNetworkRegistrationState.Searching
member.summary: Searching for available networks.
